verses.verse: The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>. Because in the <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H6144>Ar<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> is laid <S%H7703>waste<s%>, and brought to <S%H1820>silence<s%>; because in the <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H7024>Kir<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> is laid <S%H7703>waste<s%>, and brought to <S%H1820>silence<s%>;

He is gone <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H1006>Bajith<s%>, and to <S%H1769>Dibon<s%>, the high <S%H1116>places<s%>, to <S%H1065>weep<s%>: <S%H4124>Moab<s%> shall <S%H3213>howl<s%> over <S%H5015>Nebo<s%>, and over <S%H4311>Medeba<s%>: on all their <S%H7218>heads<s%> shall be <S%H7144>baldness<s%>, and every <S%H2206>beard<s%> cut <S%H1438>off<s%>.

In their <S%H2351>streets<s%> they shall <S%H2296>gird<s%> themselves with <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%>: on the <S%H1406>tops<s%> of their houses, and in their <S%H7339>streets<s%>, every one shall <S%H3213>howl<s%>, <S%H1065>weeping<s%> <S%H3381>abundantly<s%>.

And <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> shall <S%H2199>cry<s%>, and <S%H500>Elealeh<s%>: their <S%H6963>voice<s%> shall be <S%H8085>heard<s%> even unto <S%H3096>Jahaz<s%>: therefore the armed <S%H2502>soldiers<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> shall cry <S%H7321>out<s%>; his <S%H5315>life<s%> shall be <S%H3415>grievous<s%> unto him.

My <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall cry <S%H2199>out<s%> for <S%H4124>Moab<s%>; his <S%H1280>fugitives<s%> shall flee unto <S%H6820>Zoar<s%>, an <S%H5697>heifer<s%> of three years <S%H7992>old<s%>: for by the mounting <S%H4608>up<s%> of <S%H3872>Luhith<s%> with <S%H1065>weeping<s%> shall they go it <S%H5927>up<s%>; for in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2773>Horonaim<s%> they shall raise <S%H5782>up<s%> a <S%H2201>cry<s%> of <S%H7667>destruction<s%>.

For the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H5249>Nimrim<s%> shall be <S%H4923>desolate<s%>: for the <S%H2682>hay<s%> is withered <S%H3001>away<s%>, the <S%H1877>grass<s%> <S%H3615>faileth<s%>, there is no green <S%H3418>thing<s%>.

Therefore the <S%H3502>abundance<s%> they have <S%H6213>gotten<s%>, and that which they have laid <S%H6486>up<s%>, shall they carry <S%H5375>away<s%> to the <S%H5158>brook<s%> of the <S%H6155>willows<s%>.

For the <S%H2201>cry<s%> is gone round <S%H5362>about<s%> the <S%H1366>borders<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>; the <S%H3215>howling<s%> thereof unto <S%H97>Eglaim<s%>, and the <S%H3215>howling<s%> thereof unto <S%H879>Beer-elim<s%>.

For the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H1775>Dimon<s%> shall be <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%>: for I will <S%H7896>bring<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> upon <S%H1775>Dimon<s%>, <S%H738>lions<s%> upon him that <S%H6413>escapeth<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, and upon the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H127>land<s%>.
